post.text: We made a promise to these heroes. Veterans defend America, and America will defend you. #MakeAmericaGreatAgain

comment.author: Taylor
comment.text: Trump one of the dumbest,an as a Law an Order President first you need to Investigate yourself and Show ur Tax Reports an Dye ur hair brown an stop looking like a head of burn grass in the Sun.

replies.author: Deserray
replies.text: Are you a multi-billionaire?? I think it's clear who is very intelligent and not dumb.

replies.author: Taylor
replies.text: Are you you don't base a President because he got money you must be Poor an White. Get It

replies.author: Alexis
replies.text: He emld his tax returns---they were thicker than any book you have ever read :)

replies.author: Deserray
replies.text: Taylor doesn't matter what I am....I'm not who made the dumb comment...you were. Doesn't matter what color I am....I know a brilliant person when I see one.

replies.author: Deserray
replies.text: Trump pays more taxes in a single year than you make in a lifetime. You would vote for a crook that can't tell the truth and sent and received top secret documents over an unsecured server...sorry, I know I'm getting over your head.... Anyway, no disrespect here, but I do wish you would study up on Trump. I've read all his books and my hubby and I have followed him for 30+ years.... He is a good man.
